Question: HCMF Group CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HCMF Group

Intelligent Cabin Products

- Supported by the Ministry of Economic Affairs and in collaboration with Taiwanese companies
- Showcased at CES 2024, Booth 7211
- Developed with Taiwan Design Research Institute and National Taiwan University's Smart Living Center
- Features innovative in-car safety technology
- Includes an in-car Child Presence Detection (CPD) system
- Millimeter-wave (mmWave) intelligent car door sensing technology unveiled
